titles.title: Directing the Clerk of the House to make a correction in the enrollment of H.R. 2157.
Directing the Clerk of the House to make a correction in the enrollment of H.R. 2157.

action.text: Ms. Waters asked unanimous consent to consider as introduced.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: Received in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: This concurrent resolution directs the Clerk of the House of Representatives to make a correction in the enrollment of H.R. 2157 (Additional Supplemental Appropriations for Disaster Relief Act, 2019) to correct a date included in the section that extends the National Flood Insurance Program.
